radiographic_examinations.findings: Echogenic liver consistent with fatty infiltration. No evidence of intrahepatic or extrahepatic biliary duct dilation. Common bile duct measures 3 mm. At least three mobile echogenic focuses within the gallbladder consistent with gallstones. Gallbladder normal without evidence of wall thickening, dilation, or pericholecystic fluid. Visualized portion of the pancreas unremarkable. Spleen measures 11 cm with homogeneous echotexture. Right and left kidneys normal without masses, hydronephrosis, or stones. Visualized portions of the aorta and inferior vena cava appear normal.
